text: Patrick Arthur Doyle (born 6 April 1953) is a Scottish film composer with Irish heritage. == Life and career == === Early life === Doyle was born on 6 April 1953 in Uddingston, South Lanarkshire, Scotland. == Life == Doyle lives with his wife Lesley, with whom he has four children. == Other websites == * Category:1953 births Category:British composers Category:Living people Category:Movie score composers Category:People from South Lanarkshire
title: Patrick Doyle
